summary: Complete API documentation for all public packages in the TypeScript SDK. This task involves documenting the worker, client, workflow, activity, proto, and create packages, with documentation to be published.
userImpact: Users need complete and accessible API documentation to effectively use all public packages in the TypeScript SDK.
resolutionDetails: All public packages (worker, client, workflow, activity, proto, create) were documented and published.
keyQuote: Complete API documentation for all public packages
